Articles.Content:
I've seen a couple minor bugs with lighting and thought I should report them:

After sending Bill, Bob, and Jeb out on their first interplanetary trip, they returned to find a strange Kerbin:

Going to the space center and reloading the capsule smoothed it out. Switching in and out of map view did not.

The second issue is that apparently command modules don't cast shadows:

Note that if Bob backs up there, he'll illuminate the capsule, but it still won't cast a shadow.

In case this is a driver issue or just me, here are some details:

01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: NVIDIA Corporation GK107 [GeForce GTX 650] (rev a1)

$ uname -a

Linux stalactite 3.16.0-4-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 3.16.7-ckt7-1 (2015-03-01) x86_64 GNU/Linux

I am running the 64-bit build of 1.0.2.

Edited May 3, 2015 by saskwach
